      • checkFoodExists

        public boolean checkFoodExists​(java.lang.String name,
                               int id)
        This method is used to check if a food exists in the database. If the the food name is unknowm then name must be null. If the food id is unknown then id must be -1.
        Parameters:
        name -
        id -
        Returns:
        True if the food exists and false if the food doesnt exist
